abstract: Less than a month into his new gig as EMI’s chief executive, Roger Faxon already has some ideas for shoring up the struggling music label, according to The New York Post.
snippet: Less than a month into his new gig as EMI’s chief executive, Roger Faxon already has some ideas for shoring up the struggling music label, according to The New York Post.
lead_paragraph: Less than a month into his new gig as the chief executive of EMI Group, Roger Faxon already has some ideas for shoring up the struggling music label, according to The New York Post.

headline.main: EMI Chief Said to Present Turnaround Plan Soon
